categories.name: Nail Polishes
categories.description: Discover our wide range of nail polishes, available in various colors and finishes. Choose from glossy, matte, metallic, or glittery options to create your perfect manicure.

categories.name: Gel Nails
categories.description: Explore our collection of high-quality gel nail products, including base coats, top coats, and gel polishes in various colors for a long-lasting, chip-free manicure.

categories.name: Acrylic Nails
categories.description: Find everything you need for stunning acrylic nails, including acrylic powders, liquids, and tools. Create beautiful and durable nail extensions with ease.

categories.name: Nail Art
categories.description: Get creative with our nail art supplies, including decals, stickers, rhinestones, and more. Add intricate designs and unique touches to your manicure for a truly personalized look.

categories.name: Nail Tools
categories.description: Browse our selection of professional nail tools, such as files, brushes, clippers, and cuticle pushers. Equip yourself with high-quality tools for the perfect manicure or pedicure.

categories.name: Nail Treatments
categories.description: Choose from our range of nail treatments to help strengthen, repair, and protect your nails. Maintain healthy nails and cuticles with our selection of nourishing products.

categories.name: Nail Removal
categories.description: Find all the essentials for safe and effective nail removal, including nail polish removers, acetone, and soak-off solutions. Remove nail enhancements with ease and minimal damage.

categories.name: Manicure & Pedicure
categories.description: Discover our assortment of manicure and pedicure products, including creams, scrubs, and lotions. Pamper and nourish your hands and feet for a luxurious at-home spa experience.
